key_risks: Regulatory compliance challenges increasing operational costs
Intense competition from larger banks and fintech companies
Customer sensitivity to interest rates and fees
controversies: Customer complaints regarding account management, fees, and service responsiveness
Mixed customer reviews with an overall rating of 3.6 out of 5 stars
social_issues: Customer retention challenges due to service quality and fee sensitivity
governance_issues: Ongoing need to maintain robust governance and compliance frameworks
